name: Barbara Walter
text: Best pizza ever!  And we eat PH all the time at home

name: Evan Isgar
text: A true gulity pleasure. If they would deliver to me, i would buy so much more often. And the wings are crispy!!! Not flabby. PLEASE support this location if you enjoy it... I dont want to loose it.

name: Trevor Brady
text: These folks work hard. The food is always good and they always deliver it hot. The delivery drivers are very friendly. Since the quarantine started we ask that they leave the food at our door. The drivers will call and let us know they …More

name: Pat Wilson
text: The last two pizzas I had have been terrible.  Very few toppers and even less sauce.  Will find someplace else to get good pizza.

name: Jonathan Cook
text: The new buffet was amazing

name: Jessica Bunt
text: Pizzas are made in a new way.  Not like I remember.  Staff very friendly though.

name: Ginger Houck
text: This pizza is good as long as you get right person that has good customer service. Which I know one is Alice.

name: Chris m
text: Very happy with service. Took advantage of the 3 topping pizza for $9.99 deal. Ordered 2 pizzas to go for pick up. Was ready on time and was made exactly as I had ordered.

name: Lisa Ford
text: Normally love pizza hut hot or cold. The one I got from Oneonta was not great fresh and hot and barely edible cold or rewarded. Crust was hard on the edge. Garlic knots were good though

name: Lorraine Wallin
text: One of the worst pizzas I have eaten thin crust tasted like cardboard sauce and cheese no taste. Toppings dried out. I use to enjoy Pizza Hut but boy it has changed!

name: Courtney Smith
text: The pizza was done right and bread sticks were too

name: Vic Debbie Silvernail
text: Fast delivery out to the car good tasting price was right

name: Scooter Racing
text: The food was great. However the poor old restaurant seriously needs an update and some cleaning. The service was good as well. I just wish the place could be updated. Apparently they have a severe lack of storage space.

name: Mike Z
text: Great staff, will order again

name: Marley Fergy
text: I love this place. Good food and great people

name: Rich Cole
text: Had the buffet..quick and easy. Annoying customer yelling at her kids knocked the rating down. Food was fine

name: Louis Armas
text: I enjoy coming here for their different buffet pizzas. I have always found the food here to be of excellent quality and the staff friendly and helpful. The times I have come for dinner, I have chosen different pizza crusts and none of them …More

name: ItsTinaPearl
text: It's a pretty good pizza place. Its not the best Pizza Hut I've been too much it's doing well. There was nice customer service, but even better pizza. That's why it's a 4/5 for me.

name: The Forbidden Podcast
text: What happened? Like seriously what happened? When I went in a few months ago I placed an order and gave them plenty of time to do it. I even came in 10 minutes late and my pizza still wasn't ready. I had to wait with a bunch of people for about 30 minutes to get my pizza while the employees were flipping out.

name: Hell Wray
text: My husband had ordered a big dinner box online...and there was no sauce on the pizzas, we had no marinara sauce for the breadsticks and no utensils for the Alfredo, yet they gave us plates and napkins. Not only that, we called them and they put us on hold for a very long time then hung up.

name: Just Chekn
text: Food is Great, Staff is Friendly....  The restaurant is Dingy and Dated...needs a Makeover....  Parking LOT has a HUGE CRater as you enter and Leave...BAD BAD BAD

name: Jonathan Everson
text: My family and I always have a great experience at Pizza Hut in Oneonta. Very friendly staff and the food is second to none. Highly recommend!

name: Judy Lorber
text: Better service then the one in Cooperstown. Need parking lot fixed  desperately.

name: Sherry Green
text: Dirty,Dirty. There was only one girl working doing it all.the shakers and the menus and other things were sticky dirty and nasty. We wont go back.

name: Cynthia Simonds
text: Came in to order pizza. The Manager that was working complaining. Talking so loud that a customer told him to tone it down, he got mad and complained to another customer about the gentleman telling him to tone it down. Then told hostess I …More

name: Kyle
text: Pizza was really doughy but wings were great

name: Phil Grocholl
text: Service was fine, and food was hot off the buffet, which is what we had, but the flavor was plain. Normally it is better than it was today.

name: Dale Snyder
text: Food was good. Still looks like Pizza Hut, maybe could use a make over sometime.

name: Rick
text: It's what you'd expect for a Pizza Hut. The inside is run-down and doesn't seem overly clean. I still come here quite often however and the food is quite good given the circumstances. Staff is very friendly and are always doing their best. …More

name: Eddie Hickey
text: Website said open to 12, got there at 11 and they were closed (July 4th), went to try again but was hotter inside then outside, took our sodas to go and left.  Was told ac was working, they need a new AC guy, staff was very friendly and agreed with us.

name: Amber M.
text: Food was good but I was supposed to get a 2 liter soda with my order and was not given one nor reminded to get one. I believe it's the workers who should remind you to get it or have it ready because they do have you select which soda you want when ordering online.

name: Frank Lomangino
text: The staff was fantastic buffet was great!

name: Danielle Simon
text: The waitress seemed new, but she was still good. We went for the lunch buffet and I liked that the waitress came and asked what pizza we wanted so they could make it for the buffet.

name: Kevin Morris
text: Good food good service

name: Crystal Gonsalves
text: The new employees are amazing def reccomend this place

name: Larissa Salisbury
text: I would give 0 stars if I could. Had pizza delivered to my place not too long ago. My boyfriend and I both got sick that night. Then I found out the delivery guy had saved my number with my name and was telling people he had my number. Completely creeped out. Isn't that a violation of privacy?!

name: Raymond Passero
text: Pizza left a lot to be desired friendly service

name: Sheila Eiholzer
text: Great food and friendly

name: Shawn LaRock
text: Love their pizza and wings. Friendly staff.

name: Jerm Rell
text: Nothing but proe.s seems like the peolme can't figure out how to make pizza

name: Christopher Qua
text: Great pizza and friendly staff!

name: Dave Johnson
text: My family love the meat marinara and the hot wings

name: Eric Lane
text: Food was hot and fresh. The service was good very friendly atmosphere. The wall in side the restaurant makes the place feel smaller and a inconvenience for people who have disabilities.

name: michael sylvia
text: I got no help from the manager I can't use computers I couldn't get a pizza from this Pizza hut outrageous

name: Jess C
text: I ordered online, as I received a few promotional codes in the mail to be used online. Navigating the website was quick and easy, didn't require any guess work. I was given an estimated delivery time of 45 minutes. …More

name: Sharon Bar-Lev
text: Its unbelievable that pizza hut runs such a filthy place! You literally stick to the floor when walking in the restaurant , in addition the bathrooms where in horrible condition. Yack!

name: Julissa Freire
text: Just called at 9:10pm for a delivery, after we give them our order (5mins into the call) the staff proceeds to tell us that they cannot complete the order due to the fact that they are cleaning the fryers... why not say that at the …More

name: Dino G
text: 8 p.m no personal pan or kid's pizza and no medium pan on a Saturday when they close at 11. Maybe that is why the lot is empty.  Nice waitress but terrible planning

name: Tammy Clarson
text: Our waitress acted like she was rushing us. Food was good tho. Miss those reg wings tho ! :)

name: Robin Lander
text: The pizza was mostly dough hardly any toppings

name: Tracy
text: Went in for the lunch buffet at 12:45 and most of the hot food was either empty or dryed out and nothing was replenished in the time I was there.

name: David Smith
text: The staff at this location are great. The quality of food at this location is a lot better then the mismanagement at the Cooperstown location.  It is  a great place for cheap reasonable  quality pizza wings and more.

name: Allyson Keator
text: Great food, great place

name: Laura Eichler
text: I walk in to pick up pre ordered pizzas. The manager never acknowledged my presents nor the other customer. As I waited I figured she'd say I'll be with you in a moment. No such greeting occurred. After 6 to 8 minutes with no acknowledgment …More

name: John Gardner
text: The food was hot and fresh, and the staff were very friendly and positive! The table was kind of sticky though, but outside of that everything else was good.

name: Karen Hovick
text: Very friendly staff

name: dancing is life
text: it is good pizza and I love their other foods that they have. It also is well known place near the movies so you can see a great movie and then I have great food but I would only give it four

name: Casandra Hubbard
text: Friendly service. N hot food

name: matthew
text: Pizza is much better but entrance is still very steep and tables are sticky! Could not move my napkins without lifting up.

name: Deborah Zvirzdin
text: Always very kind when odering and picking order up.

name: Jarrett Benjamin
text: Fast. Hot food. Good pizza

name: Paul Pieringer
text: Very under staffed, food in salad bar was ice cold and took forever for them to put fresh stuff out. Seats are worn out almost no padding in the seats. They care more about order outs abd deliveries rather than the people eating in the restraunt. Dont waste your money. Go some where else to eat.

name: Michael Clapper
text: One of the few old school Pizza Huts left even has the Ms Pac Man game from when I was a teenager lol

name: Timothy Bishop
text: I love working for  pizza hut

name: Matt Schuler
text: This location always does a great job.

name: jenny jester
text: Always good service whether it's been 2 weeks or 6 months between visits. Love the lunch buffet!

name: Robert Weeks
text: Good pizza.  Good people.

name: Travis Farnsworth
text: Nice employees. Friendly waitress. Fresh buffet.

name: Ralph Dalessio
text: Great pizza.. Great prices...

name: vincent mashburn
text: Great food, selection, service and price.

name: Travis Buley
text: Great lunch buffet, helpful staff.

name: RIT Guy
text: Dinner buffet was terrible. Pizza selection was very limited, breadsticks were way over cooked, and the marinara dipping sauce was burnt and crusty as if it had been cooking all day. Perhaps the worst thing about it was the manager's lack …More

name: Eric C. Johnson
text: lunch buffet can be quite good.  But DO NOT ask about any of the adds they put on tv.  They get just plain hateful.  I'd be scared of what "special toppings" they might add.  Parking lot needs work.  Frankly, I don't know how much longer they will be in business.  Sad really, used to go there a lot growing up.

name: Nightowl
text: Spaghetti is terrible. How can u mess up noodles and sauce

name: kat palisi
text: It pizza hut

name: Andrew Fetky
text: Good food, great service!!!

name: Rich Reny
text: Good pizza for a chain restaurant

name: Mark M
text: Friendly and accommodated a large group of 35 on a Monday night.  A little disorganized, pizza so-so, and poor beer selection.

name: Christopher Hannah
text: Good pizza

name: Patrick Jarvis
text: Service was fast quality was great

name: John Banks
text: Good pizza deals to eat in or take out.

name: Mohamed Khalifa
text: Pretty good

name: Steve Lester Almeida
text: Lunch buffet = Good food for good price!

name: Steven St. Laurent
text: I was hungry, they had food

name: Nancy F
text: No. Just no. Dirty. Tasteless food. Poor service. No.

name: Ty Bridges
text: Its Like every Pizza hut,but different people,it's ok

name: Robin Wayman
text: Very poor selection ... service sucked ... should not take 15 minutes at the check out window to pay .

name: Chris Terzini

text: Workers won't pick up the phone and when you do get someone its 45 min for a pizza . Very unprofessional .
